Data files

See the section "Apps and data files" of the softinex portal for the general behaviour to get data files.

The file types known by EsbRootView are : 

     .root : files at CERN-ROOT format containing EsbRoot events or generic TGeo geometry.
     .bsg : binary (inlib) scene graph files. For examples for avatars.

The resource directory, coming with an instalation, contains the "evetest.root" file with some events. You can test the application by using it. Then : 

     Files > "resource directory" > .root > evetest.root

When done, click on "Next event" from the main menu to read and visualize an event (WCDetectorPoints) :

(You can do "Next event" also from a button in the left camera panel).

See the section "Apps general behaviour" of the softinex portal to "move around" in the scene, about the camera left and right panels and about the popup menus (gloabl and contextuals).

Layout

With "geo/wc" you can add the cylinder of the water tank. With "floor", add some grid representing the floor, and with "avatars/sarah", have a little avatar showing the scale of the detector.

By using "show plots", you can add in overlay a 2D plot representing the event "a la ROOT". By setting a perspective camera ("P/O" button in the right camera panel), and rotating around up axis, you should see something as :
